string-array.name: version_changelog
string-array.item: Due to the size of this update, previous settings have been cleared
You can now change some settings from your watch
App Theme changing has been reworked, with more options
The app\'s accent colour is now purple
Icons are now outline variants where possible
Battery Sync and Do not Disturb Sync have been moved to their own screens
You can now sync Do not Disturb state with Theater Mode on your watch
Battery icons should be more accurate now
Dialog styles should be more consistent now
Fixed a bug where you could get stuck infinitely loading when trying to enable \'Phone to Watch Sync\'
Fixed crashing when tapping on the DnD Sync notification
Fix a potential crash when locking your phone or updating battery stats from your watch
